name: webshot-worker
description: Service to capture requests for image capture

scripts.docker-tag-sha: docker tag -f rosskukulinski/webshot-worker:latest rosskukulinski/webshot-worker:$(git rev-parse HEAD)
scripts.docker-all: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-tag-sha && npm run docker-push

author: Ross Kukulinski <ross@nodesource.com>
